intro-text.display:
# Michelin Analytics Hub

> Comprehensive visual analytics of the Michelin Guide dataset with interactive filtering. Explore trends, distributions, and insights across restaurants worldwide.

**Data Coverage**: 2019–Present | **Interactive Filtering**: All visualizations update dynamically

key-metrics.title: Key Metrics
key-metrics.query: WITH current_year_data AS (SELECT ra.*, r.location FROM restaurant_awards ra JOIN restaurants r ON ra.restaurant_id = r.id WHERE ra.year BETWEEN COALESCE(:start_year, 2018) AND COALESCE(:end_year, 2026) [[ AND LOWER(r.location) LIKE LOWER('%' || :location || '%') ]] [[ AND LOWER(r.cuisine) LIKE LOWER('%' || :cuisine || '%') ]] [[ AND ra.distinction = :distinction ]]) SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT restaurant_id) as total_restaurants, COUNT(*) as total_awards, COUNT(DISTINCT year) as years_covered, ROUND(CAST(COUNT(*) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(DISTINCT year), 1) as avg_awards_per_year, COUNT(CASE WHEN green_star = 1 THEN 1 END) as green_stars FROM current_year_data

awards-distribution.title: Current Awards Distribution
awards-distribution.query: WITH latest_awards AS (SELECT ra.distinction, ra.restaurant_id FROM restaurant_awards ra JOIN restaurants r ON ra.restaurant_id = r.id WHERE ra.year = (SELECT MAX(year) FROM restaurant_awards WHERE restaurant_id = ra.restaurant_id) AND ra.year BETWEEN COALESCE(:start_year, 2018) AND COALESCE(:end_year, 2026) [[ AND LOWER(r.location) LIKE LOWER('%' || :location || '%') ]] [[ AND LOWER(r.cuisine) LIKE LOWER('%' || :cuisine || '%') ]] [[ AND ra.distinction = :distinction ]]) SELECT distinction, COUNT(*) as count FROM latest_awards GROUP BY distinction ORDER BY CASE distinction WHEN '3 Stars' THEN 1 WHEN '2 Stars' THEN 2 WHEN '1 Star' THEN 3 WHEN 'Bib Gourmand' THEN 4 WHEN 'Selected Restaurants' THEN 5 END

yearly-trends.title: Awards Trends by Year
yearly-trends.query: SELECT ra.year, ra.distinction, COUNT(*) as count FROM restaurant_awards ra JOIN restaurants r ON ra.restaurant_id = r.id WHERE ra.year BETWEEN COALESCE(:start_year, 2018) AND COALESCE(:end_year, 2026) [[ AND LOWER(r.location) LIKE LOWER('%' || :location || '%') ]] [[ AND LOWER(r.cuisine) LIKE LOWER('%' || :cuisine || '%') ]] [[ AND ra.distinction = :distinction ]] GROUP BY ra.year, ra.distinction ORDER BY ra.year, CASE ra.distinction WHEN '3 Stars' THEN 1 WHEN '2 Stars' THEN 2 WHEN '1 Star' THEN 3 WHEN 'Bib Gourmand' THEN 4 WHEN 'Selected Restaurants' THEN 5 END

geographic-distribution.title: Top Locations by Awards
geographic-distribution.query: SELECT TRIM(SUBSTR(r.location, 1, CASE WHEN INSTR(r.location, ',') > 0 THEN INSTR(r.location, ',') - 1 ELSE LENGTH(r.location) END)) AS city, COUNT(DISTINCT ra.restaurant_id) as total_restaurants, COUNT(CASE WHEN ra.distinction IN ('3 Stars', '2 Stars', '1 Star') THEN 1 END) as star_restaurants FROM restaurants r JOIN restaurant_awards ra ON r.id = ra.restaurant_id WHERE ra.year BETWEEN COALESCE(:start_year, 2018) AND COALESCE(:end_year, 2026) [[ AND LOWER(r.location) LIKE LOWER('%' || :location || '%') ]] [[ AND LOWER(r.cuisine) LIKE LOWER('%' || :cuisine || '%') ]] [[ AND ra.distinction = :distinction ]] GROUP BY city HAVING total_restaurants >= 5 ORDER BY star_restaurants DESC, total_restaurants DESC LIMIT 15

cuisine-performance.title: Cuisine Types by Star Concentration
cuisine-performance.query: SELECT r.cuisine, COUNT(DISTINCT ra.restaurant_id) as total_restaurants, COUNT(CASE WHEN ra.distinction IN ('3 Stars', '2 Stars', '1 Star') THEN 1 END) as star_count, ROUND(CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN ra.distinction IN ('3 Stars', '2 Stars', '1 Star') THEN 1 END) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(DISTINCT ra.restaurant_id) * 100, 1) as star_percentage FROM restaurants r JOIN restaurant_awards ra ON r.id = ra.restaurant_id WHERE ra.year BETWEEN COALESCE(:start_year, 2018) AND COALESCE(:end_year, 2026) [[ AND LOWER(r.location) LIKE LOWER('%' || :location || '%') ]] [[ AND LOWER(r.cuisine) LIKE LOWER('%' || :cuisine || '%') ]] [[ AND ra.distinction = :distinction ]] GROUP BY r.cuisine HAVING total_restaurants >= 10 ORDER BY star_percentage DESC LIMIT 12

green-star-trends.title: Green Star Sustainability Awards
green-star-trends.query: SELECT ra.year, COUNT(*) as green_star_count FROM restaurant_awards ra JOIN restaurants r ON ra.restaurant_id = r.id WHERE ra.green_star = 1 AND ra.year BETWEEN COALESCE(:start_year, 2018) AND COALESCE(:end_year, 2026) [[ AND LOWER(r.location) LIKE LOWER('%' || :location || '%') ]] [[ AND LOWER(r.cuisine) LIKE LOWER('%' || :cuisine || '%') ]] [[ AND ra.distinction = :distinction ]] GROUP BY ra.year ORDER BY ra.year

price-analysis.title: Price Distribution Across Awards
price-analysis.query: SELECT ra.price, ra.distinction, COUNT(*) as count FROM restaurant_awards ra JOIN restaurants r ON ra.restaurant_id = r.id WHERE ra.price IS NOT NULL AND ra.year BETWEEN COALESCE(:start_year, 2018) AND COALESCE(:end_year, 2026) [[ AND LOWER(r.location) LIKE LOWER('%' || :location || '%') ]] [[ AND LOWER(r.cuisine) LIKE LOWER('%' || :cuisine || '%') ]] [[ AND ra.distinction = :distinction ]] GROUP BY ra.price, ra.distinction ORDER BY ra.price, CASE ra.distinction WHEN '3 Stars' THEN 1 WHEN '2 Stars' THEN 2 WHEN '1 Star' THEN 3 WHEN 'Bib Gourmand' THEN 4 WHEN 'Selected Restaurants' THEN 5 END

search-intro.display:
# Restaurant Explorer

> Search and analyze individual restaurants with **restaurant name search** and comprehensive filtering. View current awards, award history, and detailed information.

**Search Tips**: Use the Restaurant Name field for targeted search, or combine filters for broader exploration.

search-metrics.title: Search Results Summary
search-metrics.query: WITH filtered_restaurants AS (SELECT DISTINCT r.id FROM restaurants r JOIN restaurant_awards ra ON r.id = ra.restaurant_id WHERE (CASE WHEN :restaurant_name IS NULL OR :restaurant_name = '' THEN 1=1 WHEN SUBSTR(:restaurant_name, 1, 1) = '=' THEN r.name = SUBSTR(:restaurant_name, 2) ELSE LOWER(r.name) LIKE LOWER('%' || :restaurant_name || '%') END) [[ AND LOWER(r.location) LIKE LOWER('%' || :location || '%') ]] [[ AND LOWER(r.cuisine) LIKE LOWER('%' || :cuisine || '%') ]] [[ AND ra.distinction = :current_distinction ]] [[ AND ra.price = :price_range ]] [[ AND ((ra.green_star = 1 AND :has_green_star = 'Yes') OR (ra.green_star = 0 AND :has_green_star = 'No') OR :has_green_star IS NULL OR :has_green_star = '') ]] AND ra.year = (SELECT MAX(year) FROM restaurant_awards WHERE restaurant_id = r.id)) SELECT COUNT(*) as matching_restaurants, COUNT(CASE WHEN ra.distinction IN ('3 Stars', '2 Stars', '1 Star') THEN 1 END) as starred_restaurants, COUNT(CASE WHEN ra.green_star = 1 THEN 1 END) as green_star_restaurants FROM filtered_restaurants fr JOIN restaurant_awards ra ON fr.id = ra.restaurant_id AND ra.year = (SELECT MAX(year) FROM restaurant_awards WHERE restaurant_id = fr.id)

restaurant-results.title: Restaurant Search Results
restaurant-results.query: SELECT r.name, r.location, r.cuisine, ra.distinction as current_distinction, ra_prev.distinction as previous_distinction, ra.price, CASE WHEN ra.green_star = 1 THEN '✓' ELSE '' END as green_star, r.website_url FROM restaurants r LEFT JOIN restaurant_awards ra ON r.id = ra.restaurant_id AND ra.year = (SELECT MAX(year) FROM restaurant_awards WHERE restaurant_id = r.id) LEFT JOIN restaurant_awards ra_prev ON r.id = ra_prev.restaurant_id AND ra_prev.year = (SELECT MAX(year) FROM restaurant_awards WHERE restaurant_id = r.id AND year < (SELECT MAX(year) FROM restaurant_awards WHERE restaurant_id = r.id)) WHERE (CASE WHEN :restaurant_name IS NULL OR :restaurant_name = '' THEN 1=1 WHEN SUBSTR(:restaurant_name, 1, 1) = '=' THEN r.name = SUBSTR(:restaurant_name, 2) ELSE LOWER(r.name) LIKE LOWER('%' || :restaurant_name || '%') END) [[ AND LOWER(r.location) LIKE LOWER('%' || :location || '%') ]] [[ AND LOWER(r.cuisine) LIKE LOWER('%' || :cuisine || '%') ]] [[ AND ra.distinction = :current_distinction ]] [[ AND ra.price = :price_range ]] [[ AND ((ra.green_star = 1 AND :has_green_star = 'Yes') OR (ra.green_star = 0 AND :has_green_star = 'No') OR :has_green_star IS NULL OR :has_green_star = '') ]] ORDER BY CASE ra.distinction WHEN '3 Stars' THEN 1 WHEN '2 Stars' THEN 2 WHEN '1 Star' THEN 3 WHEN 'Bib Gourmand' THEN 4 WHEN 'Selected Restaurants' THEN 5 ELSE 6 END, r.name LIMIT 25

geographic-map.title: Restaurant Locations Map
geographic-map.query: SELECT r.name, r.location, r.latitude, r.longitude, ra.distinction, ra.price FROM restaurants r LEFT JOIN restaurant_awards ra ON r.id = ra.restaurant_id AND ra.year = (SELECT MAX(year) FROM restaurant_awards WHERE restaurant_id = r.id) WHERE r.latitude IS NOT NULL AND r.longitude IS NOT NULL AND (CASE WHEN :restaurant_name IS NULL OR :restaurant_name = '' THEN 1=1 WHEN SUBSTR(:restaurant_name, 1, 1) = '=' THEN r.name = SUBSTR(:restaurant_name, 2) ELSE LOWER(r.name) LIKE LOWER('%' || :restaurant_name || '%') END) [[ AND LOWER(r.location) LIKE LOWER('%' || :location || '%') ]] [[ AND LOWER(r.cuisine) LIKE LOWER('%' || :cuisine || '%') ]] [[ AND ra.distinction = :current_distinction ]] [[ AND ra.price = :price_range ]] [[ AND ((ra.green_star = 1 AND :has_green_star = 'Yes') OR (ra.green_star = 0 AND :has_green_star = 'No') OR :has_green_star IS NULL OR :has_green_star = '') ]] LIMIT 200

individual-timeline.title: Individual Restaurant Timeline
individual-timeline.query: SELECT r.name, ra.year, ra.distinction, CASE WHEN ra.green_star = 1 THEN 'Green Star' ELSE '' END as sustainability, ra.price FROM restaurants r JOIN restaurant_awards ra ON r.id = ra.restaurant_id WHERE (CASE WHEN :restaurant_name IS NULL OR :restaurant_name = '' THEN 1=1 WHEN SUBSTR(:restaurant_name, 1, 1) = '=' THEN r.name = SUBSTR(:restaurant_name, 2) ELSE LOWER(r.name) LIKE LOWER('%' || :restaurant_name || '%') END) [[ AND LOWER(r.location) LIKE LOWER('%' || :location || '%') ]] [[ AND LOWER(r.cuisine) LIKE LOWER('%' || :cuisine || '%') ]] [[ AND ra.price = :price_range ]] [[ AND ((ra.green_star = 1 AND :has_green_star = 'Yes') OR (ra.green_star = 0 AND :has_green_star = 'No') OR :has_green_star IS NULL OR :has_green_star = '') ]] ORDER BY r.name, ra.year

recent-changes.title: Recent Award Changes
recent-changes.query: WITH recent_changes AS (SELECT r.name, r.location, ra1.year, ra1.distinction as current_distinction, LAG(ra1.distinction) OVER (PARTITION BY r.id ORDER BY ra1.year) as previous_distinction FROM restaurants r JOIN restaurant_awards ra1 ON r.id = ra1.restaurant_id WHERE (CASE WHEN :restaurant_name IS NULL OR :restaurant_name = '' THEN 1=1 WHEN SUBSTR(:restaurant_name, 1, 1) = '=' THEN r.name = SUBSTR(:restaurant_name, 2) ELSE LOWER(r.name) LIKE LOWER('%' || :restaurant_name || '%') END) [[ AND LOWER(r.location) LIKE LOWER('%' || :location || '%') ]] [[ AND LOWER(r.cuisine) LIKE LOWER('%' || :cuisine || '%') ]] ORDER BY r.id, ra1.year) SELECT name, location, year, previous_distinction || ' → ' || current_distinction as change FROM recent_changes WHERE current_distinction != previous_distinction AND year >= 2018 ORDER BY year DESC LIMIT 10

restaurant_finder.sql: SELECT r.name, r.location, r.cuisine, ra.price, ra.distinction as current_distinction, ra_prev.distinction as previous_distinction, r.url, r.website_url, r.phone_number, r.facilities_and_services, r.latitude, r.longitude FROM restaurants r LEFT JOIN restaurant_awards ra ON r.id = ra.restaurant_id AND ra.year = (SELECT MAX(year) FROM restaurant_awards WHERE restaurant_id = r.id) LEFT JOIN restaurant_awards ra_prev ON r.id = ra_prev.restaurant_id AND ra_prev.year = (SELECT MAX(year) FROM restaurant_awards WHERE restaurant_id = r.id AND year < (SELECT MAX(year) FROM restaurant_awards WHERE restaurant_id = r.id)) WHERE (CASE WHEN :name IS NULL OR :name = '' THEN 1=1 WHEN SUBSTR(:name, 1, 1) = '=' THEN r.name = SUBSTR(:name, 2) ELSE LOWER(r.name) LIKE LOWER('%' || :name || '%') END) AND (:location IS NULL OR :location = '' OR LOWER(r.location) LIKE LOWER('%' || :location || '%')) AND (:cuisine IS NULL OR :cuisine = '' OR LOWER(r.cuisine) LIKE LOWER('%' || :cuisine || '%')) AND (:distinction IS NULL OR :distinction = '' OR LOWER(ra.distinction) LIKE LOWER('%' || :distinction || '%')) ORDER BY CASE ra.distinction WHEN '3 Stars' THEN 1 WHEN '2 Stars' THEN 2 WHEN '1 Star' THEN 3 WHEN 'Bib Gourmand' THEN 4 WHEN 'Selected Restaurants' THEN 5 ELSE 6 END, r.name LIMIT CASE WHEN :limit IS NULL OR :limit = '' THEN 50 ELSE :limit END
restaurant_finder.title: Restaurant & Award Finder
restaurant_finder.description: Search restaurants by name, location, cuisine, or distinction. Instantly see current and previous awards, map data, and details. Filter by name (exact match with '=' prefix), location, cuisine, distinction. Sorted by distinction and name. Default limit: 50.

award_timeline.sql: SELECT r.name, r.location, r.cuisine, COALESCE(NULLIF(ra.wayback_url,''), r.url ) as 'url', ra.distinction, ra.price, ra.year, ra.green_star FROM restaurants r JOIN restaurant_awards ra ON r.id = ra.restaurant_id WHERE (CASE WHEN :name IS NULL OR :name = '' THEN 1=1 WHEN SUBSTR(:name, 1, 1) = '=' THEN r.name = SUBSTR(:name, 2) ELSE LOWER(r.name) LIKE LOWER('%' || :name || '%') END) AND (:location IS NULL OR :location = '' OR LOWER(r.location) LIKE LOWER('%' || :location || '%')) AND (:cuisine IS NULL OR :cuisine = '' OR LOWER(r.cuisine) LIKE LOWER('%' || :cuisine || '%')) AND (:distinction IS NULL OR :distinction = '' OR LOWER(ra.distinction) LIKE LOWER('%' || :distinction || '%')) AND (:start_year IS NULL OR :start_year = '' OR ra.year >= :start_year) AND (:end_year IS NULL OR :end_year = '' OR ra.year <= :end_year) ORDER BY r.name, ra.year DESC LIMIT CASE WHEN :limit IS NULL OR :limit = '' THEN 50 ELSE :limit END
award_timeline.title: Award Timeline Viewer
award_timeline.description: Explore the complete award history for any restaurant. Filter by name (exact match with '=' prefix), location, cuisine, distinction, start year, end year. Sorted by name and year. Default limit: 50.

michelin_star_streaks.sql: SELECT r.name, r.location, r.cuisine, r.url, ra.distinction, ra.price, MIN(ra.year) as start_year, MAX(ra.year) as end_year, COUNT(*) as streak_length, SUM(CASE WHEN ra.green_star = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as green_star_years FROM restaurants r JOIN restaurant_awards ra ON r.id = ra.restaurant_id WHERE ra.distinction IN ('3 Stars', '2 Stars', '1 Star') AND (CASE WHEN :name IS NULL OR :name = '' THEN 1=1 WHEN SUBSTR(:name, 1, 1) = '=' THEN r.name = SUBSTR(:name, 2) ELSE LOWER(r.name) LIKE LOWER('%' || :name || '%') END) AND (:location IS NULL OR :location = '' OR LOWER(r.location) LIKE LOWER('%' || :location || '%')) AND (:cuisine IS NULL OR :cuisine = '' OR LOWER(r.cuisine) LIKE LOWER('%' || :cuisine || '%')) AND (:distinction IS NULL OR :distinction = '' OR LOWER(ra.distinction) LIKE LOWER('%' || :distinction || '%')) AND (:start_year IS NULL OR :start_year = '' OR ra.year >= :start_year) AND (:end_year IS NULL OR :end_year = '' OR ra.year <= :end_year) GROUP BY r.id, ra.distinction HAVING streak_length >= 2 ORDER BY streak_length DESC, ra.distinction DESC, r.name LIMIT CASE WHEN :limit IS NULL OR :limit = '' THEN 50 ELSE :limit END
michelin_star_streaks.title: Longest Star Streaks
michelin_star_streaks.description: Find restaurants with the longest consecutive years at each Michelin Star level, including Green Star awards. Filter by name (exact match with '=' prefix), location, cuisine, distinction, start year, end year. Sorted by streak length and distinction. Default limit: 50.

star_progression.sql: WITH progression_data AS (SELECT r.id, r.name, r.location, r.cuisine, MIN(CASE WHEN ra.distinction = 'Selected Restaurants' THEN ra.year END) as first_selected_year, MIN(CASE WHEN ra.distinction = 'Bib Gourmand' THEN ra.year END) as first_bib_year, MIN(CASE WHEN ra.distinction LIKE '%Star%' THEN ra.year END) as first_star_year, MAX(CASE WHEN ra.distinction = '3 Stars' THEN ra.year END) as three_star_year, MAX(CASE WHEN ra.distinction LIKE '%Star%' THEN ra.distinction END) as highest_star FROM restaurants r JOIN restaurant_awards ra ON r.id = ra.restaurant_id GROUP BY r.id), progression_calc AS (SELECT pd.*, CASE WHEN pd.three_star_year IS NOT NULL THEN (pd.three_star_year - COALESCE(pd.first_star_year, COALESCE(pd.first_bib_year, pd.first_selected_year))) WHEN pd.first_star_year IS NOT NULL AND (pd.first_bib_year IS NOT NULL OR pd.first_selected_year IS NOT NULL) THEN (pd.first_star_year - COALESCE(pd.first_bib_year, pd.first_selected_year)) ELSE NULL END as progression_years FROM progression_data pd WHERE (pd.three_star_year IS NOT NULL OR (pd.first_star_year IS NOT NULL AND (pd.first_bib_year IS NOT NULL OR pd.first_selected_year IS NOT NULL)))) SELECT pc.name, pc.location, pc.cuisine, pc.first_selected_year, pc.first_bib_year, pc.first_star_year, pc.three_star_year, pc.highest_star, ABS(pc.progression_years) as years_to_change, CASE WHEN pc.progression_years > 0 THEN 'Progression' ELSE 'Regression' END as progression_status FROM progression_calc pc WHERE pc.progression_years IS NOT NULL AND (CASE WHEN :name IS NULL OR :name = '' THEN 1=1 WHEN SUBSTR(:name, 1, 1) = '=' THEN pc.name = SUBSTR(:name, 2) ELSE LOWER(pc.name) LIKE LOWER('%' || :name || '%') END) AND (:location IS NULL OR :location = '' OR LOWER(pc.location) LIKE LOWER('%' || :location || '%')) AND (:cuisine IS NULL OR :cuisine = '' OR LOWER(pc.cuisine) LIKE LOWER('%' || :cuisine || '%')) AND (:progression_status IS NULL OR :progression_status = '' OR progression_status = :progression_status) ORDER BY pc.progression_years ASC LIMIT CASE WHEN :limit IS NULL OR :limit = '' THEN 50 ELSE :limit END
star_progression.title: Progression & Regression Pathways
star_progression.description: Shows how restaurants move between Selected Restaurants, Bib Gourmand, and Michelin Stars—including both progression and regression. 'progression_status' indicates direction; 'years_to_change' is the absolute number of years to progress or regress. Filter by name (exact match with '=' prefix), location, cuisine, progression_status (Progression/Regression). Default limit: 50.

star_change_tracker.sql: WITH distinction_changes AS (SELECT r.id, r.name, r.location, r.cuisine, ra1.year, ra1.distinction as current_distinction, LAG(ra1.distinction) OVER (PARTITION BY r.id ORDER BY ra1.year) as previous_distinction FROM restaurants r JOIN restaurant_awards ra1 ON r.id = ra1.restaurant_id WHERE ra1.distinction IN ('3 Stars', '2 Stars', '1 Star', 'Bib Gourmand', 'Selected Restaurants') ORDER BY r.id, ra1.year) SELECT dc.name, dc.location, dc.cuisine, COUNT(CASE WHEN dc.current_distinction != dc.previous_distinction THEN 1 END) as total_changes, GROUP_CONCAT(CASE WHEN dc.current_distinction != dc.previous_distinction THEN dc.year || ': ' || dc.previous_distinction || ' → ' || dc.current_distinction ELSE NULL END, ' | ') as change_history FROM distinction_changes dc WHERE dc.previous_distinction IS NOT NULL AND (CASE WHEN :name IS NULL OR :name = '' THEN 1=1 WHEN SUBSTR(:name, 1, 1) = '=' THEN dc.name = SUBSTR(:name, 2) ELSE LOWER(dc.name) LIKE LOWER('%' || :name || '%') END) AND (:location IS NULL OR :location = '' OR LOWER(dc.location) LIKE LOWER('%' || :location || '%')) GROUP BY dc.id, dc.name, dc.location, dc.cuisine HAVING total_changes > 0 AND (:total_changes IS NULL OR :total_changes = '' OR total_changes = CAST(:total_changes AS INTEGER)) ORDER BY total_changes DESC LIMIT CASE WHEN :limit IS NULL OR :limit = '' THEN 30 ELSE :limit END
star_change_tracker.title: Distinction Change Tracker
star_change_tracker.description: Track restaurants with changes in Michelin distinctions—including Stars, Bib Gourmand, and Selected Restaurants. View their transformation history (only years with actual changes). Filter by name (exact match with '=' prefix), location, exact total changes. Sorted by most volatile. Default limit: 30.

cuisine_breakdown.sql: WITH filtered_awards AS (SELECT * FROM restaurant_awards WHERE (:year IS NULL OR :year = '' OR year = :year)), latest_awards AS (SELECT ra.* FROM restaurant_awards ra INNER JOIN (SELECT restaurant_id, MAX(year) AS max_year FROM restaurant_awards GROUP BY restaurant_id) lam ON ra.restaurant_id = lam.restaurant_id AND ra.year = lam.max_year), awards_to_join AS (SELECT * FROM filtered_awards WHERE :year IS NOT NULL AND :year <> '' UNION ALL SELECT * FROM latest_awards WHERE :year IS NULL OR :year = ''), split AS (SELECT r.id AS restaurant_id, TRIM(SUBSTR(r.cuisine || ',', 1, INSTR(r.cuisine || ',', ',') - 1)) AS cuisine_part, SUBSTR(r.cuisine || ',', INSTR(r.cuisine || ',', ',') + 1) AS rest FROM restaurants r UNION ALL SELECT restaurant_id, TRIM(SUBSTR(rest, 1, INSTR(rest, ',') - 1)), SUBSTR(rest, INSTR(rest, ',') + 1) FROM split WHERE rest <> ''), joined AS (SELECT s.cuisine_part AS cuisine, a.* FROM split s LEFT JOIN awards_to_join a ON s.restaurant_id = a.restaurant_id WHERE s.cuisine_part <> '' AND (:cuisine IS NULL OR :cuisine = '' OR LOWER(s.cuisine_part) LIKE LOWER('%' || :cuisine || '%')) AND (:distinction IS NULL OR :distinction = '' OR LOWER(a.distinction) LIKE LOWER('%' || :distinction || '%'))) SELECT cuisine, COUNT(DISTINCT restaurant_id) as total_restaurants, COUNT(CASE WHEN distinction = '3 Stars' THEN 1 END) as three_stars, COUNT(CASE WHEN distinction = '2 Stars' THEN 1 END) as two_stars, COUNT(CASE WHEN distinction = '1 Star' THEN 1 END) as one_star, COUNT(CASE WHEN distinction = 'Bib Gourmand' THEN 1 END) as bib_gourmand, COUNT(CASE WHEN distinction = 'Selected Restaurants' THEN 1 END) as selected_restaurants, COUNT(CASE WHEN green_star = 1 THEN 1 END) as green_star FROM joined GROUP BY cuisine HAVING total_restaurants >= 1 ORDER BY three_stars DESC, two_stars DESC, one_star DESC, total_restaurants DESC LIMIT CASE WHEN :limit IS NULL OR :limit = '' THEN 50 ELSE :limit END
cuisine_breakdown.title: Cuisine Awards Breakdown
cuisine_breakdown.description: Compare award distribution across cuisines for any year. Filter by cuisine, distinction, year. Sorted by distinction and total. Default limit: 50.

location_breakdown.sql: SELECT CASE WHEN INSTR(r.location, ',') & gt; 0 THEN TRIM(SUBSTR(r.location, 1, INSTR(r.location, ',') -1)) ELSE TRIM(r.location) END AS city, CASE WHEN INSTR(r.location, ',') & gt; 0 THEN TRIM(SUBSTR(r.location, INSTR(r.location, ',') + 1)) ELSE NULL END AS region, COUNT(DISTINCT r.id) AS total_restaurants, SUM(ra.distinction = '3 Stars') AS three_stars, SUM(ra.distinction = '2 Stars') AS two_stars, SUM(ra.distinction = '1 Star') AS one_star, SUM(ra.distinction = 'Bib Gourmand') AS bib_gourmand, SUM(ra.distinction = 'Selected Restaurants') AS selected_restaurants, SUM(ra.green_star = 1) AS green_star FROM restaurants r LEFT JOIN restaurant_awards ra ON r.id = ra.restaurant_id AND ra.year = COALESCE( NULLIF(:year, ''),( SELECT MAX(year) FROM restaurant_awards ra2 WHERE ra2.restaurant_id = r.id ) ) WHERE ( :location IS NULL OR :location = '' OR lower(r.location) LIKE lower('%' || :location || '%') ) AND ( :distinction IS NULL OR :distinction = '' OR lower(ra.distinction) LIKE lower('%' || :distinction || '%') ) GROUP BY city, region HAVING total_restaurants & gt; = 1 ORDER BY three_stars DESC, two_stars DESC, one_star DESC, total_restaurants DESC LIMIT COALESCE(NULLIF(:limit, ''), 50);
location_breakdown.title: Location Awards Breakdown
location_breakdown.description: Analyze award counts by city and region for any year. Filter by location, distinction, year. Sorted by distinction and total. Default limit: 50.

price_breakdown.sql: SELECT ra.price, COUNT(DISTINCT ra.restaurant_id) as total_restaurants, SUM(CASE WHEN ra.distinction = '3 Stars' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as three_stars, SUM(CASE WHEN ra.distinction = '2 Stars' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as two_stars, SUM(CASE WHEN ra.distinction = '1 Star' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as one_star, SUM(CASE WHEN ra.distinction = 'Bib Gourmand' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as bib_gourmand, SUM(CASE WHEN ra.distinction = 'Selected Restaurants' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as selected_restaurants, SUM(CASE WHEN ra.green_star = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as green_star FROM restaurants r JOIN restaurant_awards ra ON r.id = ra.restaurant_id WHERE ra.price IS NOT NULL AND (:price IS NULL OR :price = '' OR LOWER(ra.price) LIKE LOWER('%' || :price || '%')) AND (:distinction IS NULL OR :distinction = '' OR LOWER(ra.distinction) LIKE LOWER('%' || :distinction || '%')) AND (:year IS NULL OR :year = '' OR ra.year = :year) AND ra.year = CASE WHEN :year IS NULL OR :year = '' THEN (SELECT MAX(year) FROM restaurant_awards WHERE restaurant_id = r.id) ELSE :year END GROUP BY ra.price ORDER BY ra.price LIMIT CASE WHEN :limit IS NULL OR :limit = '' THEN 50 ELSE :limit END
price_breakdown.title: Price & Awards Breakdown
price_breakdown.description: See award counts by price range for any year. Filter by price, distinction, year. Sorted by distinction and price. Default limit: 50.

facilities_breakdown.sql: WITH facilities_split AS (SELECT r.name, r.location, ra.distinction, ra.green_star, TRIM(REPLACE(REPLACE(facility.value, '"', ''), '[', '')) as facility FROM restaurants r JOIN restaurant_awards ra ON r.id = ra.restaurant_id AND ra.year = CASE WHEN :year IS NULL OR :year = '' THEN (SELECT MAX(year) FROM restaurant_awards WHERE restaurant_id = r.id) ELSE :year END, json_each('["' || REPLACE(r.facilities_and_services, ',', '","') || '"]') as facility WHERE r.facilities_and_services IS NOT NULL AND r.facilities_and_services != '' AND (:distinction IS NULL OR :distinction = '' OR LOWER(ra.distinction) LIKE LOWER('%' || :distinction || '%'))) SELECT facility, COUNT(*) as total_restaurants, COUNT(CASE WHEN distinction = '3 Stars' THEN 1 END) as three_stars, COUNT(CASE WHEN distinction = '2 Stars' THEN 1 END) as two_stars, COUNT(CASE WHEN distinction = '1 Star' THEN 1 END) as one_star, COUNT(CASE WHEN distinction = 'Bib Gourmand' THEN 1 END) as bib_gourmand, COUNT(CASE WHEN distinction = 'Selected Restaurants' THEN 1 END) as selected_restaurants, COUNT(CASE WHEN green_star = 1 THEN 1 END) as green_star FROM facilities_split WHERE facility != '' AND (:facility IS NULL OR :facility = '' OR LOWER(facility) LIKE LOWER('%' || :facility || '%')) GROUP BY facility HAVING total_restaurants >= 1 ORDER BY three_stars DESC, two_stars DESC, one_star DESC, total_restaurants DESC LIMIT CASE WHEN :limit IS NULL OR :limit = '' THEN 20 ELSE :limit END
facilities_breakdown.title: Facility & Awards Breakdown
facilities_breakdown.description: Discover how facilities and services relate to Michelin awards. Filter by facility, distinction, year. Sorted by distinction and total. Default limit: 30.

green_star_trends.sql: SELECT ra.year, COUNT(*) as green_star_count FROM restaurant_awards ra WHERE ra.green_star = 1 AND (:start_year IS NULL OR :start_year = '' OR ra.year >= :start_year) AND (:end_year IS NULL OR :end_year = '' OR ra.year <= :end_year) GROUP BY ra.year ORDER BY ra.year
green_star_trends.title: Green Star Growth Trends
green_star_trends.description: Track the rise of Michelin Green Stars over time. Filter by start year, end year. Sorted by year.

restaurants.description_html: Core dataset of Michelin Guide restaurants with comprehensive information including location, cuisine type, facilities, and contact details.

columns.id: Internal unique identifier for the restaurant
columns.cuisine: Type of cuisines served at the restaurant
columns.description: Michelin Guide description of the restaurant
columns.facilities_and_services: Facilities and services offered at the restaurant
columns.name: Name of the restaurant
columns.phone_number: Contact phone number of the restaurant
columns.url: Michelin Guide URL of the restaurant's listing
columns.website_url: URL of the restaurant's official website
columns.created_at: Timestamp when the restaurant record was created
columns.updated_at: Timestamp when the restaurant record was last updated

restaurant_awards.description_html: Historical dataset of Michelin awards including stars, Bib Gourmand designations, price ranges, and Green Star sustainability awards by year.

columns.id: Internal unique identifier for the award record
columns.restaurant_id: Foreign key reference to the restaurant
columns.year: Year when the award was given
columns.distinction: Type of Michelin distinction (e.g., 3 Stars, 2 Stars, 1 Star, Bib Gourmand, Selected Restaurants)
columns.price: Price range of the restaurant for this award year (e.g., $, $$, $$$)
columns.green_star: Boolean indicating whether the restaurant received a Michelin Green Star for sustainable gastronomy practices
columns.created_at: Timestamp when the award record was created
columns.updated_at: Timestamp when the award record was last updated
